channel.title: Moving NCP + AutoSpawning
channel.description:
Can someone please post your own autospawn file here. I have one from hyberscape, and its awesome, but i need someone who has lumby FULL. Also, when I summon a kalphite queen i cannot attack it, and sometimes my autospawn just stops working after i edit something.
//----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat--health ncp = 1 Man 2 5 2 7 ----------------------------------------------------------------------
There are 3 extra bars. Very disorganized. Please post what it means.
A = NCP ID B & C = NCP NAME D = COMBAT E = HP F = ?? G = ?? H =??
So yeah, and please explain to me on DROPS how do i make it so, say I want 1 item to appear ALL THE TIME, and 1 item to appear every 100-500 times. I would really appreciate it. Please reply, maybe not with all info, but just some. I love your forums, best I seen. I always get help from you thanks.

item.title: Moving NCP + AutoSpawning
item.dc:creator: @masonw masonw
item.description:
@masonw wrote:

its just not in coloms. The first number after an npc is its lvl the second is its health, don’t worry about it not being it straight rows.

Read full topic

item.title: Moving NCP + AutoSpawning
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

hmmmm did you run and compile?
